net.tridentsdk.server.concurrent

Class ThreadsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.concurrent.ThreadsHandler

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ThreadsHandler
extends Object
    Handles the majority of the lifecycle for the concurrent
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team
